name: Wish
desc: Has a 80% chance to do 30 true damage to your opponent. 20% chance to deal the damage to yourself

name: Crushing Blow
desc: Brings boss's armor down to 1, player's armor to their class value

name: Switch
desc: Switches 80% of your mana with health and vice versa

name: Healing Blood
desc: Changes 3 mana per turn to 4 health per turn

name: Inner Light
desc: Changes 3 mana per turn to 5 mana per turn

name: Cleanse
desc: Removes all the current effects on you

name: Alleviate
desc: Heals you and your allies for 40 health

name: Blast
desc: Deals 15 damage to you and your opponent

name: Time Loop
desc: Adds 25 health and mana all players in the fight

name: Amplify
desc: Adds a one-time 7 strength boost to your next spell

name: Glass Armor
desc: Adds 20 defense to your enemies next spell
